channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: More shrimp sold at Kroger stores recalled for possible radioactive contamination
item.description: A Seattle seafood distributor has recalled more cooked and frozen shrimp sold at Kroger grocery stores across the U.S. because of ongoing concerns about potential radioactive contamination.

item.title: Man charged with shining laser pointer at Marine One with Trump aboard
Man accused of trying to assassinate Trump in Florida rests his case without testifying
